channel.title: Actiotech | Insights made Easy
channel.description: Recent content on Actiotech | Insights made Easy

item.title: Data Engineer
item.description: Jobs Description We are looking for top engineers who want to apply what they have learned in their Masters or PhD programs and their hands-on engineering, to tackle challenging problems and, who have the passion and capacity to quickly learn new skills.

item.title: DevOps Engineer
item.description: Jobs Description We’re currently looking for someone who’s eager to lead in transforming the way we handle our DevOps.

item.title: Frontend Engineer
item.description: Jobs Description We’re looking for a developer who loves to code JavaScript HTML and CSS, and who also has a good feeling for modern web design.
